properties.Description: The additional properties of a Media Service resource.

location.Description: The geographic location of the resource. This must be one of the supported and registered Azure Geo Regions (for example, West US, East US, Southeast Asia, and so forth).

tags.Description: Tags to help categorize the resource in the Azure portal.

apiEndpoints.Description: Read-only property that lists the Media Services REST API endpoints for this resource. If supplied on a PUT or PATCH, the value will be ignored.

storageAccounts.Description: The storage accounts for this resource.

majorVersion.Description: The version of Media Services REST API.

id.Description: The id of the storage account resource. Media Services relies on tables and queues as well as blobs, so the primary storage account must be a Standard Storage account (either Microsoft.ClassicStorage or Microsoft.Storage). Blob only storage accounts can be added as secondary storage accounts (isPrimary false).

isPrimary.Description: Is this storage account resource the primary storage account for the Media Service resource. Blob only storage must set this to false.

primaryKey.Description: The primary key for the Media Service resource.

secondaryKey.Description: The secondary key for the Media Service resource.
